name: Wrong Floor
description:
Wrong floor is a short ~10-15 minute first person horror game.

Elevator with the main character falls into the basement, but the one who lives there clearly does not like it.

Can you get out of this terrible place?

W A S D- walk

E- use

Right mouse- zoom

Shift- run

F- flashlight

L?

Gamepad can be used.

Есть русский язык.
